sudo cat /etc/nginx/snippets/snakeoil.conf
# Self signed certificates generated by the ssl-cert package
# Don't use them in a production server!

ssl_certificate /etc/ssl/certs/ssl-cert-snakeoil.pem;
ssl_certificate_key /etc/ssl/private/ssl-cert-snakeoil.key;
(venv) root@agodamagic:/home/agoda-app#
(venv) root@agodamagic:/home/agoda-app#
(venv) root@agodamagic:/home/agoda-app# sudo grep -r "snakeoil" /etc/nginx/
/etc/nginx/sites-available/default:     # include snippets/snakeoil.conf;
/etc/nginx/sites-available/default:     # include snippets/snakeoil.conf;
/etc/nginx/snippets/snakeoil.conf:ssl_certificate /etc/ssl/certs/ssl-cert-snakeoil.pem;
/etc/nginx/snippets/snakeoil.conf:ssl_certificate_key /etc/ssl/private/ssl-cert-snakeoil.key;
(venv) root@agodamagic:/home/agoda-app#
(venv) root@agodamagic:/home/agoda-app#
(venv) root@agodamagic:/home/agoda-app#
(venv) root@agodamagic:/home/agoda-app# sudo ls -la /etc/nginx/conf.d/
total 8
drwxr-xr-x 2 root root 4096 Aug 22 12:46 .
drwxr-xr-x 8 root root 4096 Sep 13 07:44 ..
(venv) root@agodamagic:/home/agoda-app#
(venv) root@agodamagic:/home/agoda-app#
(venv) root@agodamagic:/home/agoda-app# sudo cat /etc/nginx/conf.d/*.conf 2>/dev/null || echo "conf.d에 파일 없음"
conf.d에 파일 없음
(venv) root@agodamagic:/home/agoda-app#
(venv) root@agodamagic:/home/agoda-app#
(venv) root@agodamagic:/home/agoda-app#
(venv) root@agodamagic:/home/agoda-app# sudo mv /etc/nginx/snippets/snakeoil.conf /etc/nginx/snippets/snakeoil.conf.backup
(venv) root@agodamagic:/home/agoda-app#
(venv) root@agodamagic:/home/agoda-app#
(venv) root@agodamagic:/home/agoda-app# sudo systemctl stop nginx
(venv) root@agodamagic:/home/agoda-app#
(venv) root@agodamagic:/home/agoda-app#
(venv) root@agodamagic:/home/agoda-app# sudo systemctl start nginx
(venv) root@agodamagic:/home/agoda-app#
(venv) root@agodamagic:/home/agoda-app#
(venv) root@agodamagic:/home/agoda-app#
(venv) root@agodamagic:/home/agoda-app# sudo systemctl status nginx

     Loaded: loaded (/lib/systemd/system/nginx.service; enabled; vendor preset: enabled)
